content: krystal shawl was designed to use just one ball of roll with it yarn and be easy enough for a beginner knitter to make you start with a few stitches and increase along one edge while slowly decreasing along the other edge creating a rounded crescent shaped asymmetrical shawl krystal alternates with garter stitch sections and easy lace sections then finishes off with an easy to do picot bind off yarn red heart roll with it sparkle 5 29 oz 150g 561 yds 513m one ball i used colorway krystal needles us 8 5mm circular needles-to accommodate the number of stitches size 37 94cm wide x 44 112cm long skill level easy beginner stitches used are knit purl yarn overs knit into front and back to increase knit 2 together to decrease
